div.div:
In this example, every message is 8 bytes, and the minimum buffered bytes is set to 15
and max wait time is 3 seconds

switch.text: In this example, every message is 8 bytes, and the minimum buffered bytes is set to 1...

div.div:
if 3 seconds elapse
and the batch doesn't
reach the minimum size, the
messages are received anyways

a.text: Viewer does not support full SVG 1.1
